pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī araññe viharati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.3: Tassāyasmato vihāro abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā itthiyo ārāmaṁ āgamaṁsu vihārapekkhikāyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.5: Atha kho tā itthiyo yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.8: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī tā itthiyo vihāraṁ pekkhāpetvā tāsaṁ itthīnaṁ vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati yācatipi āyācatipi pucchatipi paṭipucchatipi ācikkhatipi anusāsatipi akkosatipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.9: Yā tā itthiyo chinnikā dhuttikā ahirikāyo tā āyasmatā udāyinā saddhiṁ uhasantipi ullapantipi ujjagghantipi uppaṇḍentipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.10: Yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.12: Sāmikenapi mayaṁ evaṁ vuttā na iccheyyāma, kiṁ panāyyena udāyinā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.2: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.3: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.4: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.5: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, udāyi, mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.8: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.9: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.10: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.14.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā taṁ yuvā yuvatiṁ methunupasaṁhitāhi, saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.8: rattampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ, duṭṭhampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ mūḷhampi cittaṁ vipariṇataṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.9: Api ca rattaṁ cittaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippetaṁ vipariṇatanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.11: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṁ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṁ ājānituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.17: daharo dahariṁ, taruṇo taruṇiṁ, kāmabhogī kāmabhoginiṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.1.1: Dve magge ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati, avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, yācatipi, āyācatipi, pucchatipi, paṭipucchatipi, ācikkhatipi, anusāsatipi, akkosatipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.1.21: puṭṭho bhaṇati— “evaṁ dehi. Evaṁ dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.1.23: apuṭṭho bhaṇati— “evaṁ dehi. Evaṁ dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.2: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati yācatipi āyācatipi pucchatipi paṭipucchatipi ācikkhatipi anusāsatipi akkosatipi, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.4.1: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.5: Bhikkhu ca naṁ dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.8.1: Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.2.9: Bhikkhu ca naṁ ubhinnaṁ vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.3.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.3.2: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.3.4: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.3.5: Bhikkhu ca naṁ dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.3.7: Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.3.8: Bhikkhu ca naṁ ubhinnaṁ vaccamaggaṁ passāvamaggaṁ ṭhapetvā adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.4.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.4.2: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.4.4: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.4.5: Bhikkhu ca naṁ dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.4.7: Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.4.8: Bhikkhu ca naṁ ubhinnaṁ ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.5.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.5.2: Bhikkhu ca naṁ itthiyā kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.5.4: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.5.5: Bhikkhu ca naṁ dvinnaṁ itthīnaṁ kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.5.7: Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṁ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.5.8: Bhikkhu ca naṁ ubhinnaṁ kāyapaṭibaddhaṁ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī navarattaṁ kambalaṁ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.1.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.1.6: Tassa kukkuccaṁ ahosi “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ, kacci nu kho ahaṁ saṅghādisesaṁ āpattiṁ āpanno”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kharakambalaṁ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.2.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī navāvutaṁ kambalaṁ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.3.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kharakambalakaṁ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.4.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī pāvāraṁ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.5.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī khettaṁ vapāpetvā āgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.6.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu paribbājikaṁ paṭipathe passitvā sāratto taṁ paribbājikaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sāratto aññataraṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.8.3: Api ca yaṁ sāmikassa desi taṁ nāmhākaṁ desī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sāratto aññataraṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.9.3: Api ca yaṁ aggadānaṁ taṁ nāmhākaṁ desī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.10.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kammaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.10.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṁ itthiṁ etadavoca—
